Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Screw-driver \Screw"-driv`er\, n. A tool for turning screws so as to drive them into their place. It has a thin end which enters the nick in the head of the screw. [1913 Webster]
screwdriver n 1: a hand tool for driving screws; has a tip that fits into the head of a screw 2: a cocktail made with vodka and orange juice
